body.name: Sweetcrispy Coffee Table Black, Lift Top Coffee Tables for Living Room, Small Rising Wooden Dining Center Tables with Storage Shelf and Hidden Compartment
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 14 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 🌞【Simple Style】The lift top coffee table for living room has a beautiful finish and subtly textured feel, which matches your living room/reception/office style and decor very well. This modern coffee table perfectly highlights your unique aesthetic and taste, being a part of your apartment decor.

🌞【Practical Lift Top Design】 An nice work-from-home solution. This living room table is equipped with a lifting tabletop that can be pulled out (elevated to 6.3”, bear up to 11 lbs) effortlessly when you need a quick workspace in the living room. You don't have to lean forward to access your laptop on the table. It's also the perfect dining room table to eat off, do homework, anything as your living room essentials! Stability will also be guaranteed while adjusting.

🌞【Spacious Storage】The large hidden compartment under the top table offers enough space to store your books, cups, games, snacks, keeping them away from dirt. The lifting mechanism won't take up a lot of room inside the storage part. The two shelves on the side offer extra space, saving so much time for you not having to dig around the living room to find remotes or tissue boxes.

🌞【Upgrade Design】 A recessed access is reserved for easily lifting the lid of the wood coffee table, avoiding the risk of hurting fingers. The lifting mechanism is constructed of thickened steel frame, ensuring a smooth and silent operation while keeping it solid and sturdy. Angled legs ensure stability and security. With solid construction and selected materials, this small coffee table will not wobble if correctly assembled.

🌞【Easy Assembly】The assembly for this lift-up center table is easy with the help of the enclosed parts, tools and illustrated assembly instructions. If you have any problems or questions, we would be delighted to help you find a solution and reply to your email within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great (value) coffee table- just a pain to build
reviews.reviewText: The table itself once put together looks great and is sturdy, though it's not as tall as most other coffee tables (so definitely check the height).Putting it together was a bit more difficult than most others I've built- including a step which is misleading and there is no going back from. As there are few predrilled holes it's easy to put something into the wrong hole and you're stuck. I had to personally drill extra holes to 'fix' a wrong move, so the top isn't perfectly secure but looks fine.Recommend as long as you're okay being frustrated with the building and recognize the lower height - once done it looks and functions great and is a great price for what you get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for this price
reviews.reviewText: It is a great-looking coffee table and it was fairly easy to assemble even for one person. However, the arms that lift the top are not that sturdy, and opening and closing are not as easy as it seems,NOTE: Tt has sharp corners (not safe for households with children).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: The table was easy enough to put together, a little confusing at some parts. The color is nice and the feel of the board is sturdy. Not as tall as I thought it would be after measuring my old table for comparison (more than once). Going to buy adjustable feel for the legs. And the legs would be my actual complaint, in the directions it says solid wood legs and they are plastic which kind of throws the whole look off (if you're paying attention) My guests won't notice but I will. And the lift top itself is a little wonky. Doesn't glide up with ease, worried about this for the long run. It's fine for the $55 I paid for it and I got it delivered earlier than expected....you get what you pay for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a Bargain
reviews.reviewText: This coffee table was easy to assemble, is VERY sturdy and I love the storage feature. The top rises up and is perfect for when I need to do schoolwork online. It’s been a few months and haven’t had any issues. It was a great price and you get a great coffee table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee table
reviews.reviewText: No problem putting this together. If you follow the instructions you will be fine. Looks great in the living room and it seems very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery powered screwdriver recommended for assembly.
reviews.reviewText: This coffee table is quite useful. As I live in a studio apartment, the lifting section of the table makes a great eating and working space.Assembly took about 2 hours. I suggest using a battery powered screwdriver as the pre drilled holes aren't sufficient for a hand held screwdriver.Great color and the perfect size for my place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The table is nice. It came way past my delivery date. The person who sells this sent the item past my expected due date, Amazon adv that if I didn’t get my order by 10/6 I could get a refund . The table was shipped out on oct6 lol when I finally did get it I went ahead and put it together . Instructions are easy. Some parts you might have to stare at the pick to get it lol but it’s fairly easy just tedious. The lift part of the table works great , you’ll have to really pull to get it to lift but once you get it up it goes with ease. It’s the part on the side with no lift that I had issues with . I can get it to lay straight. Also some screws on the bottom didn’t want to screw in the wood. I ended up just taping it on lol they were screws that didn’t really apply to the foundation just more of a filler I would say. But yea as long as you don’t care about shipping time for the price it’s worth it I guess

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a pain to put together. Primarily because the screws refuse to go in straight, but the liberal use of cam locks pulls everything into place. Sturdy enough for the price. Light enough to move around if needed. Sufficient storage for odds and ends.

El armado es un poco complejo para una sola persona, es mejor entre dos. Los materiales son muy buenos, es muy resistente. Llegó muy bien embalado. El tamaño y el diseño es ideal para espacios pequeños.
